name: Facebook Marketplace  - Payments Rethought
description:
I really only use Facebook for their Marketplace. I've bought a few items during the pandemic and have tried to avoid handling cash for my transactions.


I discovered that Messenger actually has an option to send payments via Paypal. It's just a feature that isn't used or very discoverable. (it's behind the little $ icon if you're wondering)

These are some solutions on how you might surface PayPal and other electronic payment options during the course of the deal.

1. Detect based on the conversation. (the same way you'd receive chat suggestions inline. )

2. Place on the item page.

(This makes payment accessible at all times)
